duck: Churn drill, a large, older drilling machine that bores large diameter holes in the ground
Churning, the process of creating butter out of milk or cream - Churn is a container in which milk or cream is shaken to form butter.
churn definition: a vessel for making butter in which milk or cream is agitated in order to separate the oily globules from the watery medium.
Churn rate, a measure of the number of individuals or items moving into or out of a collective over a specific period of time.
Churn is a container in which milk or cream is shaken to form butter.
Butter churn, a device used for churning butter

wiki.text:
'Churn' may refer to:
* Butter churn, a device used for churning butter
* Churning (butter), the process of creating butter out of milk or cream
* Milk churn, container for milk transportation
* Churn drill, a large, older drilling machine that bores large diameter holes
  in the ground
wiki.title: churn
